summary: This is a continuance of a mod called Siren Race Mod, by kampfsteak which seams to have been Banned from the site. So I decided to pick it up and fix the slack
descriptionHtml:
This is the 2.0 version of the Siren Race Mod fount here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23518
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Remove the old Siren Race before installing this one!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
============================================================================================
RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard is now required, and no longer included.
Get it here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168/
============================================================================================
Alright i got my computer up and running again, so now i should be able to work on this to make it better, next to be uploaded is a standalone Siren Follower
============================================================================================
alright so in the next week i will be moving, so i might not have net for a while then, but when i get net ill upload what i have, as well as durring that time i will work hard on Followers and adding some Special items and abilities as well as skills that are made just for the siren race.

Please don\'t be all like \"I want this and that\" I am doing this all on my own, so please just hang in their i will get everything uploaded and fixed as soon as i can, please Enjoy
============================================================================================
On a side Note if their is any mods that had been abandoned or that you would like to see worked on, please drop me a mail at muteday@live.com and i will be more then happy than to look into it.
============================================================================================
Update 2.1b
- Quick bug fix
Update 2.0b
- Cleared up a compatibility issue with Dawnguard( Please test this to find out)
- Compressed into a bsa to make the uninstall quicker and easier
- Changed to beta so i can find all bugs


Update plans
============================================================================================
Incorporating a few followers
Adding the followers already made into this mod
Creating a few special skills into this mod

update 2.2b
====================================
- Compatability script edits as well as few other things
Permissions
========================================
As long as you give the credits to me or the one who made the mod you are free to use

====================
Credits
======================
- kampfsteak- main creator
- Killer Keo for the forsaken armor mesh
- Acdale for ADEC
- Dimon99 for unp
- Caliente for cbbe_v3 body
- me for the idea, the retex on body and the race itself
- Bethesda for ck and (awesome) skyrim
author: kampfsteak and muteday
